name: ajquery
description: The fastest, most lightweight, least dependency jQuery alternative. Now typed, Ai-enhanced, and better than ever!

scripts.lint: npm run jshint && npm run tsc
scripts.build-all: npm run build-js && npm run build-cjs && npm run build-mjs
scripts.build-js: npx -p uglify-js@3 uglifyjs --compress 'assignments' --mangle reserved='["$","$$","require","exports"]' ajquery.js -o ajquery.min.js
scripts.build-cjs: npx -p uglify-js@3 uglifyjs --compress 'assignments' --mangle reserved='["$","$$","require","exports"]' ajquery.cjs -o ajquery.min.cjs
scripts.build-mjs: npx -p uglify-js@3 uglifyjs --compress 'assignments' --mangle reserved='["$","$$"]' ajquery.mjs -o ajquery.min.mjs

author: AJ ONeal <coolaj86@gmail.com> (https://coolaj86.com/)
